mapper.insert: insert into tb_conduit ( name, account, conduit_id, password, long_message, bulk_message, priority, create_date ) values ( #{name}, #{account}, #{conduitId}, #{password}, #{longMessage}, #{bulkMessage}, #{priority}, #{createDate} )
mapper.select: select id, conduit_id as conduitId, name, account, password, long_message as longMessage, bulk_message as bulkMessage, priority from tb_conduit
